title: 【Important Announcement】 The office location of the Student Living Services Division will be temporarily moved to Student Activity Center C104 starting from May 22nd
author: 陳怡秀
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 陳怡秀 - yishoue@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6212
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生_休學學生
標題： 【Important Announcement】 The office location of the Student Living Services Division will be temporarily moved to Student Activity Center C104 starting from May 22nd
日期： Tue, 21 May 2024 17:09:08 +0800

In order to cooperate with the ceiling demolition work of the Administration Building, the Living Services Division of the Office of Student Affairs will move its office to C104 on the 1st floor of the Student Activity Center starting from May 22. Information about returning to the administrative building will be announced later.

Student Liivng Services Division
